no thanks odin, also odin why does it take you so long to get home as evidenced by the count to 50 thread?

Not all of that time was the time it took me to get home. Most of it was me working.

But when my shift ended at work I checked on the thread and it was at a low number.

So I take care of some stuff on my way home and when I get on again, I'm like wait what.

That's twice in one day it's gone more than 50 in less than 30 minutes.

Fork Bomb

n.

1. A party/parlor trick involving a firecracker, Jebediah Kerman, Kerosene, Red 40 Food Dye, Mascara, Shampoo, Uranium, A 2-Inch Cast-Iron Pot, An Electric Range, An Infrared Toaster Oven, 2 nuts and bolts left over from the construction of the Brooklyn Bridge, Captain Skuky's Brain, 100% Hydrogen Peroxide, 200% Whitish-Red Vinegar, 9000 Kilolitres of Mountain Dew or Coca-Cola, Rosin Core Solder, a 1.21 Gigawatt Soldering Iron, and 2000000-40000000 Stainless Steel Forks Made in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania, USA.
